Package it.polimi.se2018.controller.effect

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChangeDiceValue
    Class that manage the changing of the dice value.
    DicePoolEffect
    Class that manage the effect of the dice pool.
    EffectGame
    Class that manage the general effects on the game.
    EndTurn
    Class that manage the end of the turn.
    FactoryEffect
    Class that manage factory dice effects.
    InsertDice
    Class that manage the inserting of the dice on a window pattern.
    RemoveDiceFromWindow
    Class that manage the removing of the dice on a window pattern.
    RoundTrackEffect
    Class that manage the effects of the round track.
    SelectValue
    Class that manage the value of a dice.
